summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5449 for the improvement of 29th Avenue West, from West Galer Street to West Dravus Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 68712 as amended by Ordinance No. 69355, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
